organic_results.title: Problems in the structure and use of educational simulation
organic_results.snippet: Despite a burgeoning array of educational simulations, developments in this area have not been guided by much in the way of clear pedagogical criteria. Such criteria are needed to facilitate comparative evaluations of existing simulations and to promote their effective use, as well as to guide future developments. Pursuant to the delineation of such criteria, a number of structural desiderata and factors contributing to the effective use of instructional simulation are identified and discussed. Attention also is given to the role of learning …
